data.name: The Fate of Baldr
data.detailed_description:
The vikings have conquered space in this third person shooter, tower defence game.
Explore the worlds of norse mythology, in singleplayer or online co op.
Mine for resources, build defences, upgrade skills and clean the worlds of their corruption.


Build defences to stop the enemies from destroying your ship.


Fight the enemy waves on the surface.


Gather resources below.


Dare to go deeper.


Upgrade your skills to survive the attacks.

Features
  • SinglePlayer
  • Online Co op
  • Third Person Shooter
  • Tower Defence

data.short_description: The vikings have conquered space in this third person shooter, tower defence game. Explore the worlds of norse mythology, in singleplayer or online co op. Mine for resources, build defences, upgrade skills and clean the worlds of their corruption.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Norwegian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Quad Core or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 or Radeon HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Quad Core or similar
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence.
